messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Sandra, about your children
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/31/2003 9:04:09 PM Mountain Standard Time, ynxn96@frontiernet.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/31/2003 9:04:09 PM Mountain Standard Time,
ynxn96@... writes:
<<I've been meaning to tell you thank you for telling us about your letter
you found on the fridge. The relationship you have with your kids is my
ideal. It's nice to have a real living family to see it in. >>

My kids know they're public guinea pigs. Poster children.
Could be worse. It could be for something less happy and positive.

Thanks for the positive comments.



Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Sandra, about your children
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been meaning to tell you thank you for telling us about your letter you found on the fridge.  The relationship you have with your kids is my ideal.  It s
messages.messageBody:
I've been meaning to tell you thank you for telling us about your letter
you found on the fridge. The relationship you have with your kids is my
ideal. It's nice to have a real living family to see it in. Sincerely,
Heidi
